one_reviews_text:
i gave this game 5 stars because while it might not be the best game around it was free and I appreciate the effort that you guys went through putting it together. If you had the physics worked out I would  have paid to play it.

thanks

I'm left handed... um.. needs some work... like a lot of work.
At least we don't have to pay to find that out.
Only gave it one star because i couldn't choose no stars.

First off, let's start off with the good... Nice pool room, bar, scenery especially, right on the waterfront. As others have said, though, it's VERY difficult to control the pool stick, and it actually operates the OPPOSITE of the way you normally shoot pool... Very frustrating, and I only did the first two difficulty levels... Afterawhile I finally figured it out, but its very tricky to get anywhere with this game... Dunno, there's less frustrating games out there... No english, no over the top shots, it just doesn't feel natural at all, and I'm a semi regular pool player...

So essentially youre forced to aim with one hand, place the cue in space.  Then using your other hand to slide placed cue on a fixed axis.

I understand why this is free, but what a waste of hard drive space.

This would be decent pool game for a GO or Samsung Gear VR user.  Any single controller type VR.   But this is clearly not meant for Rift with Touch.

Why put this on the store?  It is essentially unplayable.  The physics are all off to such a degree that it should be done over completely.  It looks like the devs ported a bad mobile app to vr and didn't even test to ensure it worked properly.  Also, why port a bad game to vr and expect good results.  it takes more to dev in this enviroment, but the rewards of getting it right are very high.  Please get away from the aim - click - stroke controls.  Is that how you play for real?  No way!

You can't grip the cue with the back hand and even when you do it does not follow your hand movements. There are plenty of other pool games out there that work, this has been poorly designed and they need to go back to the drawing board.

For me it was unplayable, the cue wouldn't function properly, it wouldn't strike the balls adequately, if those were fixed, i'd be in my element :) 
I know it's early days yet, so i'll give this what i believe it could be. I did love the graphics portion, and the movement is always good when it's not teleporting you around. I will pop back and make my alterations to my review once the game has come out of it's early stage :)
Best of luck.
This game is absolute crap. Does not work propelry at all. Dont waste you time on this
this pool game solo simulation is very helpful for practice also very realistic graphics..... waiting for more game from the developer like this
review_feedback:
Thank you so much for your feedback. 
- Thunder Game Studio Team

one_reviews_text: Lol, are you guys serious with this game..? Oculus store should have some more sections down there.. something like " Top Fail" Sorry guys, i know that some1 spent his precious time to develop this.. Maybe you start with physics first. Thanks anyway.. i had good laugh at least.
review_feedback:
We apologise for inconvenience caused. We will surely try to fix physic in coming update. Thank you for feedback.
- Thunder Game Studio Team

one_reviews_text: One of the only pool vr games and high quality.Would like accessiblity to play against ai.Also to checkout that place in the video on the screen in the pool room.
review_feedback:
Thank you so much for feedback. Sure we will add more features soon and update it. Video in game room scene is of our other VR project which we customise on client need.  Check out on website : https://www.thundergamestudio.com
Thank you.
- Thunder Game Studio Team

one_reviews_text: Buggy controls prevented me from even lining up one shot correctly. Might be cool once it gets updated/fixed. Not even worth downloading for free in its current state.
review_feedback:
We apologise for inconvenience caused. We will surely try to fix controller thing in coming update. Thank you for feedback.
- Thunder Game Studio Team

one_reviews_text: doesn't feel right and physics.... laugh out loud
I appreciate a nice free game and it has to be free because you could not ask for money for this. A bit of a mess around, but not a patch on the pool table in sports bar vr.
Started at a low height and was unable to press any of the buttons. I will check back at a later date to see if this has been fixed and change my review acordingly
review_feedback:
Sorry for inconvenience caused but this game can be played only in standing mode. Please make sure about sensor alignment. Still we are looking into issue and will fix it in next update. Once again sorry.
- Thunder Game Studio Team
